text: Menno Boelsma (8 January 1961 â€“ 10 September 2022) was a Dutch speed skater. He competed at the 1988 Winter Olympics in the 500 m and 1000 m events and finished in 16th and 24th place. He was born in Monster, Netherlands. Boelsma died on 10 September 2022 at the age of 61. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympians for the Netherlands Category:Dutch speed skaters Category:Sportspeople from South Holland
title: Menno Boelsma
